name: Ghost Brew
description:
This is the game I made for the first 42 Game Jam. The themes were Halloween & Chemistry.

The goal is to defend against waves of enemies by brewing potions that summon ghosts.

Try beating my highscore: 52.8 seconds

CONTROLS:

Add ingredients to the cauldron: Drag and drop / 1, 2, 3, 4

Summon ghost: Click the cauldron / Spacebar
